items.sentence: Tom was sitting on a park bench over there just a few minutes ago.
Tom ran to the bus stop and got there just as the bus was leaving.
Tom managed to drive the car home, even though it had a flat tire.
Tom told me that he loved me and I told him that I loved him, too.
Tom reached for the apple on the table, but Mary grabbed it first.
I hope you don't mind my mentioning this, but you know I love you.
Do you really think that baseball is more popular than basketball?
Tom knew there was no point in trying to convince Mary to do that.
It's been about two days since I put the body in the refrigerator.
My job search is really going rough. I don't have any connections.
